name: Galcon BOTS
description:
Galcon BOTS is an A.I. coding game.  Watch your bots battle it out LIVE!

Do you like coding?

Are you interested in A.I.?

Do you have a favorite text editor?

Do you enjoy modifying configuration files?

Would you rather multi-bot than play?

Does launching multiple simultaneous processes sound too good to be true?

Do you love endless stats and replay data?

Does this screenshot make you feel powerful?

Are you fluent in Python, Go, or Lua (or even some other language and are willing to port about 150 lines of protocol parsing code from any of the former)?

Then Galcon BOTS is for YOU!  Go get it NOW!  Each download includes 5 keys: 1 for you, and 4 for your bots.

If you aren't sure what you are getting into, please read the tutorial first.

https://www.galcon.com/bots/tutorial.php
